decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission
Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title number(s); 169/PL01 Rev A (Existing & proposed location & site plan), 169/PL02 Rev C (Existing & proposed ground site plan), 169/PL03 Rev B (Existing & proposed location roof plan), 169/PL04 Rev A (Existing front elevation), 169/PL05 Rev C (Existing & proposed rear elevation), 169/PL06 Rev C (Existing & proposed elevation/section side A), 169/PL07 Rev C (Existing & proposed elevation/section side B), 169/PL08 Rev C (Existing & proposed section AA), 169/PL09 Rev B (Existing & proposed section BB), 169/PL10 Rev B (Existing & proposed 3D isometric massing models), 169/PL11 Rev A (Existing local precedent context photographs), 169/PL12 Rev A (Existing local precedent context references) & Design and Access Statement Rev C
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, in the interest of proper planning.
| Notwithstanding the details shown on the approved plans, all external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building on this site.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surrounds, in accordance with polices 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan (2013), policies 1.1 (g) and 1.2 (f) of the adopted Local Development Framework (Core Strategy 2012) and policy D4of the London Plan (2021)
description: Single storey rear extension (following demolition of existing single story rear addition)
